features.title: Discounts
features.sub_title: Get upto a whooping 25% discount when purchasing any Modded OS when you're a premium supporter. **

features.title: Andronix Commands
features.sub_title: Manage all your terminal commands in one place. You get access to our web-app, the in-app integration and even a CLI.
features.icon:
<svg class="w-10 stroke-current text-blue-400" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">

features.title: Offline
features.sub_title: Download your favourite Linux Distro offline. You can store these locally on your devices.

features.title: Support Us
features.sub_title: You really help us sustain the project and constantly update the distro and the related parts.
